name: Block The Beat V0.2
description:
Block the beat is a rhythm game where you, well, block the beat! 

Do be mislead by how it looks, this game is actually very difficult. Not to mention the trailer only shows the Easy difficulty :)

This game is still in it's ALPHA stages so lot's of new content is being released very frequently. Please leave suggestions on features you would like to see!

(FOR NEWEST INFO SCROLL DOWN TO DEV LOG)

There are currently 100 waves of projectiles, 20 different projectile types, and hours worth of gameplay! 

What to expect in the future:

- In game currency (Don't worry, no in-app purchases!)

- In game shop with purchasable player icons, hit effects and shields!

- New game modes such as endless mode.

- An auto gen mode that lets you play with your own music!

- A level editor letting you make your own Beat Map!

- A custom bullet which will be customizable in the editor.

- Power ups!!!!

- An online learderboard to display the highscores. Then you can challenge your friends, or maybe even strive to be the worlds best!

- a LOT of bug fixes.

- More effects :)

- Other stuff, suggest your ideas in the comments!

The logo art was made by Ibrahim A, check him out on discord Ibz#6301
